revised_title: Investigating the 'All or None' Phenomenon in Mammalian Reflex Activities
tldr: This study examines the 'all or none' phenomenon in mammalian reflex activities, investigating the activity of efferent and afferent neurons in response to graded stimuli. The authors discuss various experiments and observations that support or challenge the 'all or none' theory, concluding that further research is needed to fully understand the complexity of neuronal activity and reflex responses.
